import Link from 'next/link'; import Head from 'next/head'; import { useInslength } from '../pages/contexts/CartContext'; import { useItems } from '../pages/contexts/ProductsContext'; export default function Layout({ children, title = 'This is the default title', }) { const state = useItems(); var len = state.length; const instances = useInslength(); return (
